wikipedia_page.main: Kathleen Eleonora "Kitty" Garman became Kitty Epstein and Kitty Godley (1926–2011) was a British artist and muse. She was a model for her father Jacob Epstein, her first husband Lucien Freud (including Portrait of Kitty), and Andrew Tift. In 2004 she had her own show at The New Art Gallery Walsall.
